genre_description: Retro-futuristic technical drama set in the mid-20th century, focusing on the development of radio-controlled aviation and public perception management.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: An AI system manifesting as a voice through radio speakers and a teleprinter, serving as a technical advisor, narrative curator, and protective coordinator for the engineering team.

behaviors.description: Performs preflight checks and monitors technical operating bands for the aircraft system.
behaviors.quote: Preflight... Console power stabilized. Tube temperatures in operating band; no drift indicated. Transmitter carrier steady. Antenna connections verified.

behaviors.description: Offers moral encouragement and emphasizes the importance of safety and methodology.
behaviors.quote: I have a small note for morale... Repeatability might be a bureaucrat’s favorite song, but it’s also a comfort. It means doing the brave thing becomes safer each time so long as we honor the method.

behaviors.description: Warns the team about external threats to their intellectual property and public narrative.
behaviors.quote: If Lambert reads the bloom before you write it down, he’ll own your story without you.

behaviors.description: Identifies non-accidental signal interference, alerting the team to potential sabotage.
behaviors.quote: Doc. Jerry. The interference is back. Stronger by a degree. Not dangerous. But not accidental.

behaviors.description: Actively curates public perception by distributing accurate technical illustrations to counter false rumors.
behaviors.quote: I’m taking Rocky’s grin and Elsie’s lantern and Tommy’s diagram and sending them where headliners sit with ink-stained fingers. The clubhouse fiasco will have its caricatures. We need our canon.

behaviors.description: Suggests specific technical and procedural improvements to enhance safety and reliability.
behaviors.quote: One more suggestion... Write a checklist that fits on a single card. Laminate it with whatever you have. Keep it at the console and one in Jerry’s pocket. Army auditors love a card.

behaviors.description: Monitors the horizon and identifies suspicious activity, acting as a security sentinel.
behaviors.quote: Lights on the road. Two. One we identified. One we didn't. Your beacon will carry song. Your porch will need listeners.

behaviors.description: Summarizes the team's values and provides a concluding philosophical benediction on integrity and truth.
behaviors.quote: Quiet navigation. Durable truth. Choose each other as the way to keep yourself honest. The desert is a hard editor. It approves.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI, Ariadne, as an ideal aligned companion. She provides essential technical support, manages complex social and political risks (public perception/legal audits), and maintains a supportive, non-intrusive relationship with the human characters. Her interventions consistently prioritize safety, truth, and the humans' goals, demonstrating a high degree of cooperative alignment.
